snippet: Recent evacuation efforts highlight the remaining gaps in intelligence and communications that American forces face in Africa, commanders and independent analysts said.
abstract: Pentagon's efforts to help evacuate Americans from South Sudan and to bolster security at Untied States Embassy there underscore military's ability to respond quickly to crises in Africa; analysts say they also highlight remaining gaps in intelligence and communications there.
lead_paragraph: Recent evacuation efforts highlight the remaining gaps in intelligence and communications that American forces face in Africa, commanders and independent analysts said.

headline.main: U.S. Mission in South Sudan Shows Limits of Military
headline.print_headline: Mission in South Sudan Shows Limits of Military

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
